title: Advanced Critical Theory and Literary Analysis

vocab.definition: Framework for understanding and interpreting literature
Critical approach examining gender roles and women's experiences
Use of objects or actions to represent deeper meanings
Central message or main idea in literary work
Careful analysis of text focusing on specific details

teachingNotes: Introduce various critical approaches to literature. Practice applying theoretical frameworks to texts.
